sentences.en: a huge dog
sentences.cn: 一条大狗

sentences.en: CBS's ratings again showed huge improvement over the previous year.
sentences.cn: 与前一年相比，哥伦比亚广播公司的收视率再次大幅提高。

sentences.en: He was a huge man, built like an oak tree.
sentences.cn: 他是个大块头，结实得像棵橡树。

sentences.en: Here the Nile broadens out between the huge granite boulders.
sentences.cn: 尼罗河在此处变宽，从两块花岗岩巨石间穿过。

sentences.en: His figure is dwarfed by the huge red McDonald'ssign.
sentences.cn: 在巨大的红色麦当劳标志牌下，他显得很矮小。

sentences.en: huge crowds
sentences.cn: 大群大群的人

sentences.en: I impressed on him what a huge honour he was being offered.
sentences.cn: 我让他铭记他当时被授予了多么大的荣誉。

sentences.en: It was a marvellous afternoon with a huge turnout of people.
sentences.cn: 那是个美妙的下午，出席人数众多。

sentences.en: Livy ate the pasties greedily and with huge enjoyment.
sentences.cn: 莉薇津津有味地大口吃着点心。

sentences.en: Men in green army uniforms are sprinkled throughout the huge auditorium.
sentences.cn: 穿着绿色军服的人星星点点地分布在整个大礼堂中。

sentences.en: On South Main Street, a huge brick building looms into view.
sentences.cn: 在南大街上，一座巨大的砖砌建筑赫然出现在人们的视线中。

sentences.en: the huge scale of the problem
sentences.cn: 该问题的严重性

sentences.en: The insurers have started hiking up premiums by huge amounts.
sentences.cn: 保险公司已经开始大幅度提高保费。

sentences.en: The island is surmounted by a huge black castle.
sentences.cn: 岛的最高处耸立着一座巨大的黑色城堡。

sentences.en: The man had a huge head of remarkably black, unruly hair.
sentences.cn: 那个人有一头乱蓬蓬的黑发。

sentences.en: There is huge overcapacity in the world car industry.
sentences.cn: 世界汽车工业的生产能力严重过剩。

sentences.en: These shoes make my feet look huge.
sentences.cn: 这双鞋让我的脚看上去大极了。

sentences.en: Traders in Marble Arch are facing huge rent increases.
sentences.cn: 大理石拱门的经销商们面临租金的大幅上涨。

sentences.en: You can compress huge amounts of data on to a CD-ROM.
sentences.cn: 可以把大量的数据压缩到一张CD-ROM上。

sentences.en: Your room’s huge compared to mine.
sentences.cn: 你的房间跟我的比很大。

trans.tran_en: extremely large in size, amount, or degree
